title: Motivation-Enhanced Continuing Professional Development (CPD) Workshop for Healthcare Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Classroom environments enabling the use of simple smartphone-based digital tools.

learning_goals: Learners can apply the four elements of the PACE model (Purpose, Autonomy, Confidence, Engagement) to real workplace scenarios.
Learners can specify at least three self-motivation strategies based on peer feedback.
Learners can establish, implement, and share results of new learning plans within two weeks in a professional setting.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
